summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5996 for the improvement of Dawson Street from 35th Avenue South to Renton Avenue; and certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 80338, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
